name: Hotel Beausoleil

reviews.text: 86 pupils and staff on a weeks ski trip.
reviews.title: School ski trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great location next to the slopes, ski off the slopes into the boot room. Friendly young staff and very helpful ski tech. Not impressed with the manager on duty who was more interested watching the football than helping when we had a kid fall down stairs. It was his night off!!!
reviews.title: Not Impressed!!

description: This Hotel must boast the best location for skiers in Alpe d'Huez with five ski lifts starting within just 250 metres of the hotel steps! Situated directly on the slopes at the highest point in the resort, with pistes running on both sides, the Beausoleil is 100m from the main Cable car the DMC.
